title: Customer Places a Future Order
description: A customer places an order but requests that it not be shipped until a specific date in the future.

tasks.description: Create a sales order with a requested future ship date.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is created in the system with the future date noted.

tasks.description: The system automatically places the order on hold until the requested ship date.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is put on hold.

tasks.description: On the requested ship date, the system automatically releases the hold and sends the order to the warehouse for fulfillment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is automatically released on the correct date.
